title: Farmer Training Program: Farming Practices panel

tasks.task: Conduct a panel discussion on agricultural practices.
subtasks: Overview of organic agriculture principles and practices.
Discuss conventional agriculture and its approach.
Explain regenerative agriculture and its relationship to permaculture.
Address the differences and similarities between various agricultural systems.
Explore the role of policy and regulation in agriculture.
Discuss the impact of population growth on food production.
Address the challenges of transitioning farming systems.
Outline the importance of soil health and ecosystem stewardship in agriculture.
